title: PORTUGUESE RULERS
text:
WORKSHOP FFMS - March 28 
Objectives

Meet the Team: Introduction to the research team
Framework & Methodology: Address questions regarding the analytical framework and methodology
Chapter Progress: Review the status of each chapter
Improvements: Discuss potential improvements for the chapters and the project
Post-Publication Prep: Prepare for the post-publication phase
